00030 #include "brisaudplistener.h"

00032 #ifdef Q_WS_X11
00033 #include <arpa/inet.h>
00034 #include <netinet/in.h>
00035 #else
00036 #include <winsock2.h>
00037 #include <ws2tcpip.h>
00038 #endif
00039 #include <cstring>
00040 
00041 BrisaUdpListener::BrisaUdpListener(QString address, quint32 port,
00042                                    QString objectName, QObject *parent) :
00043         QUdpSocket(parent)
00044 {
00045     this->address = address;
00046     this->port = port;
00047     this->objectName = objectName;
00048     this->bind(QHostAddress(address), port);
00049 }
00050 
00051 BrisaUdpListener::~BrisaUdpListener()
00052 {
00053 }
00054 
00055 void BrisaUdpListener::start()
00056 {
00057     int fd;
00058 
00059     if (!this->bind(this->port, QUdpSocket::ShareAddress |
00060                                  QUdpSocket::ReuseAddressHint)) {
00061         this->bind(QHostAddress("localhost"), port);
00062 
00063         if (!this->bind(this->port, QUdpSocket::ShareAddress |
00064                             QUdpSocket::ReuseAddressHint)) {
00065             qWarning() << this->objectName << ": failure to bind interface.";
00066         }
00067     }
00068 
00069     fd = this->socketDescriptor();
00070     struct ip_mreq mreq;
00071     memset(&mreq, 0, sizeof(struct ip_mreq));
00072     mreq.imr_multiaddr.s_addr = inet_addr(this->address.toUtf8());
00073     mreq.imr_interface.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00074 
00075     if (setsockopt(fd, IPPROTO_IP, IP_ADD_MEMBERSHIP, (char *) &mreq,
00076             sizeof(struct ip_mreq)) < 0) {
00077         qWarning() << this->objectName << ": could not join MULTICAST group.";
00078     }
00079 }
